summary: This module implements the Qt‑based driver that powers the TagStudio desktop application. It wires together the core TagStudio engine with a rich graphical user interface built from Qt widgets, handling configuration, event loops, background processing, drag‑and‑drop, dialogs, and UI components such as panels, previews, and progress widgets. It also provides a lightweight consumer helper for initializing settings and running data processing tasks.
business_intent: To deliver a user‑friendly desktop tool for organizing, tagging, and managing media collections, enabling users to interact with the TagStudio core through an intuitive Qt interface with full support for preferences, batch operations, and visual media previews.
